experiences.title: Medical Image Analysis Intern
experiences.subtitle: Torus Biomedical
workDescription: Improved workflow accuracy and efficiency by creating Python scripts to streamline analysis in Slicer 3D and Blender, using git for version control.
Authored and revised detailed standard operating procedure documentation for quality assessment and team onboarding consistency.
Segmented bones and annotated anatomical landmarks across CT datasets.
Created and improved quality assessment methods to assess segmentation analysis, annotations, and 3D coordinate systems.
Modeled hip implant stems in Fusion 360, supporting implant integration into patient-specific bone models for ML-based surgical planning.

experiences.title: Failure Analysis Co-op
experiences.subtitle: Cellcentric Fuel Cell
workDescription: Supported material characterization, testing and failure analysis of hydrogen fuel cell parts, using chemical handling and optical instruments.
Lead sample preparation for various projects, including sample preparation, chemical handling and manipulation, and embedding in epoxy for advanced imaging.
Performed non-destructive fuel cell and stack testing in cleanroom environments.
Operated a micro-CT scanner and used specialized software to reduce noise and artifacts, deconvolute objects, and reconstruct models to locate material defects.
Designed custom jigs using SolidWorks and Onshape CAD for sample preparation, reducing CT scan time and acqusition errors.
Utilized SEM imaging, optical, and laser microscopy to detect micro-detects and failure modes in fuel cell components, improving performance in future iterations.
Taught new co-op students the best practices for image analysis, and techniques for material and sample preparation.

experiences.title: Data Analysis Co-op
experiences.subtitle: IMM Lab | BC Children's Hospital
workDescription: Conducted in-depth analysis of neuroimaging and behavioral data using Python and MATLAB, from pre-processing to source localization, culminating in a published abstract at OHBM and a conference poster relating to visuomotor function.
Researched and presented best analysis practices, including the implementation of ICA and CUDA-accelerated MNE-Python to reduce computational time and artifacal removal accuracy.
Headed MEG data acquisition and operating protocols at the hospital, managing patient consent, HPI coil application, and operating paradigm scripts.
Spearheaded lab website development using Markdown, HTML, CSS and Java, using Git/Github for version control and hosting.
